user.About: Yo! A code-slingin’ dreamer from India, blending tech with a splash of stardust. 🌠 Obsessed with AI, Deep Learning, DevOps and all things Gen AI — basically turning sci-fi into real life. 🤯💡 When I’m not arguing with my code like it’s my ex, I’m chasing sunsets for the ‘Gram, calling my blurry pics “aesthetic” 📸, managing chaos like it’s a group project (and I’m the only one working), or driving like Google Maps just said “good luck.” 🗺️💥Brains, vibes, and big dreams — that’s the energy. Let’s make magic with code. 💫👨‍💻

RandomAboutText: Things I have working and willing to work on more like this
In my world, projects don’t ‘end’ — they just level up. 🎮 Every time I think I’ve nailed it, a wild idea appears, it’s a loop. And honestly? I kinda love it.” 🔁💻✨

exp1.description: Working as Google Cloud Admin at ANZ bank

exp2.description: Works as Server Admin for maintaing, installing, Configuration server for organisation

exp3.description: Works as application admin for application Configuration,Maintenance,Customization and Troubleshooting

project1.name: Green-School
project1.description: A dynamic and user-friendly website designed to showcase a school’s vision, academics, events, and community. It includes features like announcements, student/teacher portals, gallery, contact forms, and more —

project2.name: A-Education
project2.description: A clean, responsive platform designed to connect students with expert tutors. It features course listings, tutor profiles, online registration, class schedules, and contact forms — making learning accessible, organized, and engaging

project3.name: drophome
project3.description: A sleek and responsive platform that allows users to book rides quickly and easily. Features include real-time cab availability, fare estimation, driver tracking, booking history, and secure payment integration — all designed to make commuting smarter and smoother.

project4.name: Chatboat Sail
project4.description: An intelligent and interactive chatbot application designed to simulate human-like conversations. It supports real-time messaging, natural language understanding, and personalized responses — ideal for customer support, FAQs, or just having fun chats. Built for speed, simplicity, and smart interactions

project5.name: Legal Company
project5.description: A modern, responsive website built for a legal practice to showcase its services, attorneys, and areas of expertise. Features include attorney profiles, practice area pages, appointment booking, client testimonials, and a secure contact form — all designed to build trust and make legal help more accessible.

project6.name: The Stay PG
project6.description: A simple project for the PG owner to manage the in and out, joining and leaving and for managing the finance for the PG caretaker.
